name: Synthesis (pickled peanuts)
description:
robots suck! especially when you are one. Join Pre-cognitive. Locomotive. Robot. (P.L.R. for short), as he slices robots for absolutely no reason at all!

WASD to move, LMB to melee, RMB to shoot, SHIFT to sprint a short distnace,  E to gain a gun (at the cost of losing meter faster) and Q to lose a gun.
